data: From the obscurity of vast, unquiet distance the surf came booming in with the heavy impetus of high tide, flinging long streamers of kelp and bits of driftwood over the narrowing stretch of sand where garishly costumed bathers had lately shrieked hilariously at their gambols.
Bower, B. M., 1871-1940; Taylor, Henry Weston, 1881-1978 [Illustrator]
